title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-4.4 - Notification of changes in ownership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-4.4 - Notification of changes in ownership

State Regulations

Owners or operators of registered facilities must notify
the department of a change or transfer of ownership within 30 days of such
transfer by submitting an updated registration application and application for
permit transfer to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
201-4.4

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
